snippet.title: New CUPHEAD Boss Battle Gameplay @ PAX West 2016 — Three Bosses, Buying Gear & More!
snippet.description:
A brief look at Cuphead, the first title from indie developer Studio MDHR. The surrealistic shoot 'em up, drawn entirely in the style of 1930s cartoons, sees you defeating a series of bosses in order to repay a debt incurred after losing a deal with the devil.

Subscribe: https://goo.gl/qw3Ac7

Check out our full video catalog: https://goo.gl/Cqt2cn
Visit our playlists: https://goo.gl/pM7TNe
Like Polygon on Facebook: https://goo.gl/GmkOs4
Follow Polygon on Twitter: https://goo.gl/cQfqrq
Read more at: http://www.polygon.com
